select spd.ind
/flight-management/control/spd-ctrl man-set
/flight-management/control/spd-mode ias
select mach.ind
/flight-management/control/spd-ctrl man-set
/flight-management/control/spd-mode mach
select spd.ind
/flight-management/control/spd-ctrl man-set
/flight-management/control/spd-mode ias
select spd.fmgc
/flight-management/control/spd-ctrl fmgc
select lat.fmgc
/flight-management/control/lat-ctrl fmgc
select ver.fmgc
/flight-management/control/ver-ctrl fmgc
select vs.ind
/flight-management/control/ver-sub vs
select fpa.ind
/flight-management/control/ver-sub fpa
select lvlch.ind
/flight-management/fcu/level_ch 1
pick spd-sel
3 true
nasal
var spd_mode = getprop("/flight-management/control/spd-mode");
if (spd_mode == "ias") {
var ias = getprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/ias");
if (350 > ias) setprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/ias", ias + 1);
} else {
var mach = getprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/mach");
if (0.82 > mach) setprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/mach", mach + 0.01);
}
4 true
nasal
var spd_mode = getprop("/flight-management/control/spd-mode");
if (spd_mode == "ias") {
var ias = getprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/ias");
if (ias > 0) setprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/ias", ias - 1);
} else {
var mach = getprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/mach");
if (mach > 0) setprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/mach", mach - 0.01);
}
0 false
property-cycle /flight-management/control/spd-ctrl man-set fmgc
pick hdg-sel
3 true
nasal
var hdg_prop = "/flight-management/fcu-values/hdg";
if (359 > getprop(hdg_prop)) setprop(hdg_prop, getprop(hdg_prop) + 1); else setprop(hdg_prop, 0);
4 true
nasal
var hdg_prop = "/flight-management/fcu-values/hdg";
if (getprop(hdg_prop) > 0) setprop(hdg_prop, getprop(hdg_prop) - 1); else setprop(hdg_prop, 359);
0 false
property-cycle /flight-management/control/lat-ctrl man-set fmgc
pick alt-sel
3 true
nasal
var step = getprop("/flight-management/control/alt-sel-mode");
var alt_prop = "/flight-management/fcu-values/alt";
if (41000 > getprop(alt_prop)) setprop(alt_prop, getprop(alt_prop) + step);
4 true
nasal
var step = getprop("/flight-management/control/alt-sel-mode");
var alt_prop = "/flight-management/fcu-values/alt";
if (getprop(alt_prop) > 0) setprop(alt_prop, getprop(alt_prop) - step);
0 false
property-cycle /flight-management/control/ver-ctrl man-set fmgc
pick vs-sel
3 true
nasal
var sub_mode = getprop("/flight-management/control/ver-sub");
var vs_prop = "/flight-management/fcu-values/vs";
var fpa_prop = "/flight-management/fcu-values/fpa";
if (sub_mode == "vs") {
if (3000 > getprop(vs_prop)) setprop(vs_prop, getprop(vs_prop) + 100);
} else {
if (15 > getprop(fpa_prop)) setprop(fpa_prop, getprop(fpa_prop) + 1);
}
4 true
nasal
var sub_mode = getprop("/flight-management/control/ver-sub");
var vs_prop = "/flight-management/fcu-values/vs";
var fpa_prop = "/flight-management/fcu-values/fpa";
if (sub_mode == "vs") {
if (getprop(vs_prop) > -2500) setprop(vs_prop, getprop(vs_prop) - 100);
} else {
if (getprop(fpa_prop) > -10) setprop(fpa_prop, getprop(fpa_prop) - 1);
}
0 false
nasal
setprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/alt", getprop("/instrumentation/altimeter/indicated-altitude-ft"));
setprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/vs", 0);
setprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/fpa", 0);
setprop("/flight-management/control/ver-ctrl", "man-set");
pick loc
0 false
nasal
if (getprop("/flight-management/control/lat-mode") != "nav1") {
setprop("/flight-management/control/lat-mode", "nav1");
setprop("/flight-management/control/lat-ctrl", "man-set");
} else
setprop("/flight-management/control/lat-mode", "hdg");
pick gs
0 false
nasal
if (getprop("/flight-management/control/ver-mode") != "ils") {
setprop("/flight-management/control/ver-mode", "ils");
setprop("/flight-management/control/ver-ctrl", "man-set");
} else
setprop("/flight-management/control/ver-mode", "alt");
pick exped
0 false
nasal
var vs_fps = getprop("/velocities/vertical-speed-fps");
if (vs_fps >= 0) {
setprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/vs", 2800);
setprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/fpa", 10);
} else {
setprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/vs", -2500);
setprop("/flight-management/fcu-values/fpa", -10);
}
pick spd-mach
0 false
property-cycle /flight-management/control/spd-mode mach ias
pick vs-fpa
0 false
property-cycle /flight-management/control/ver-sub fpa vs
pick alt-sel-mode
0 false
property-cycle /flight-management/control/alt-sel-mode 1000 100

0 false
property-cycle /flight-management/control/ap1-master eng off

pick a-thr

property-cycle /flight-management/control/a-thrust eng off

pick ils
0 false
nasal
var radio = "/flight-management/freq/";
var ils_mode = getprop(radio~ "ils-mode");
if (ils_mode) {
setprop(radio~ "ils-mode", 0);
mcdu.rad_nav.switch_nav1(0);
} else {
setprop(radio~ "ils-mode", 1);
mcdu.rad_nav.switch_nav1(1);
}

nasal

mcdu.rad_nav.switch_nav2(0);
} else {
setprop(radio~ "mls-mode", 1);
mcdu.rad_nav.switch_nav2(1);
}

var nd_disp = getprop("/instrumentation/efis/nd/display-mode");
if (nd_disp == "ILS") setprop("/instrumentation/nd/y-center", 0.5); elsif (nd_disp == "VOR") setprop("/instrumentation/nd/y-center", 0.5); elsif (nd_disp == "NAV") setprop("/instrumentation/nd/y-center", 0.5); elsif (nd_disp == "ARC") setprop("/instrumentation/nd/y-center", 0.25); else setprop("/instrumentation/nd/y-center", 0.5);
nasal
var nd_disp = getprop("/instrumentation/efis/nd/display-mode");
